unnormalised: ## Bollywood Buzz: Who's Dating Whose Auntyji?! (And Other Crucial Info)
normalised: ## Bollywood Buzz: Who's Dating Whose Auntyji?! (And Other Crucial Info)

unnormalised: Namaste, you spicy samosas of gossip! Your weekly dose of Bollywood buzz is here, guaranteed to be more flavourful than your neighbour’s biryani (sorry, aunty!).
normalised: Namaste, you spicy samosas of gossip! Your weekly dose of Bollywood buzz is here, guaranteed to be more flavourful than your neighbour’s biryani (sorry, aunty!).

unnormalised: This week's hot topic? Is Ranbir Kapoor *really* texting Deepika Padukone again? Sources (my building's watchman, mostly) say he’s been ordering her favourite vada pav from Juhu Chowpatty late at night. Is it a friendly gesture, a movie reunion... or a secret rendezvous? The suspense is killing me more than my mother-in-law's expectations!
normalised: This week's hot topic? Is Ranbir Kapoor really texting Deepika Padukone again? Sources (my building's watchman, mostly) say he’s been ordering her favourite vada pav from Juhu Chowpatty late at night. Is it a friendly gesture, a movie reunion... or a secret rendezvous? The suspense is killing me more than my mother-in-law's expectations!

unnormalised: Speaking of reunions, remember when Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas almost broke the internet with their extravagant wedding in Jodhpur? Well, rumour has it Nick is desperately trying to learn to play the sitar to impress Madhu Chopra. Apparently, she told him his guitar skills are “very videshi, beta!” Someone get this man some Ravi Shankar CDs, pronto!
normalised: Speaking of reunions, remember when Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas almost broke the internet with their extravagant wedding in Jodhpur? Well, rumour has it Nick is desperately trying to learn to play the sitar to impress Madhu Chopra. Apparently, she told him his guitar skills are “very videshi, beta!” Someone get this man some Ravi Shankar C D's, pronto!

unnormalised: And what about Janhvi Kapoor and her rumoured romance with that Delhi businessman, Rohan? Apparently, he gifted her a diamond-encrusted autorickshaw for her birthday. An AUTORICKSHAW! I mean, I'd rather have a lifetime supply of paneer butter masala, but to each their own, right?
normalised: And what about Janhvi Kapoor and her rumoured romance with that Delhi businessman, Rohan? Apparently, he gifted her a diamond-encrusted autorickshaw for her birthday. An AUTORICKSHAW! I mean, I'd rather have a lifetime supply of paneer butter masala, but to each their own, right?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, in Chennai, sources are saying that Rajinikanth has started taking salsa lessons from Malaika Arora. Apparently, he wants to spice up his next movie's dance numbers. Imagine Thalaivar doing the cha-cha-cha! My mind is officially blown harder than a Diwali firecracker.
normalised: Meanwhile, in Chennai, sources are saying that Rajinikanth has started taking salsa lessons from Malaika Arora. Apparently, he wants to spice up his next movie's dance numbers. Imagine Thalaivar doing the cha-cha-cha! My mind is officially blown harder than a Diwali firecracker.

unnormalised: Finally, a little bird (okay, it was my cousin who works as a junior assistant on a film set) told me that Salman Khan is planning a massive Onam feast for the entire crew of his new movie. Guess bhai loves a good sadhya!
normalised: Finally, a little bird (okay, it was my cousin who works as a junior assistant on a film set) told me that Salman Khan is planning a massive Onam feast for the entire crew of his new movie. Guess bhai loves a good sadhya!

unnormalised: That's all for this week, folks! Keep those gossip antennae up and remember, "Kuch toh log kahenge, logon ka kaam hai kehna!" Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a vada pav delivery to stalk... I mean, monitor. Toodles!
